GK19kmeghvpu:0: kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:1: yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // KMdV_1 //
GK19kmeghvpu:2: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:3: āṣāḍhasya praśamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa // KMdV_2
GK19kmeghvpu:4: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau
GK19kmeghvpu:5_0: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī
GK19kmeghvpu:6_0: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:6_1: saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:7: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi praṇayakṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu // KMdV_5 //
GK19kmeghvpu:8: jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:9: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ yācñā vandhyā varam
GK19kmeghvpu:11: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya
GK19kmeghvpu:12_0: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:13_0: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ āpṛcchasva priyasakham
GK19kmeghvpu:13_1: amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu /
GK19kmeghvpu:14_0: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś
GK19kmeghvpu:14_1: cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:15_0: garbhādhānasthiraparicayā nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām
GK19kmeghvpu:16_0: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ sadyaḥpātapraṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm
GK19kmeghvpu:16_1: ucchilindhrām avandhyaṃ tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:17_0: ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas
GK19kmeghvpu:17_1: tvatprayāṇānukūlaṃ saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam
GK19kmeghvpu:18: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya // KMdV_13 //
GK19kmeghvpu:19: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:20_0: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalehān ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam
GK19kmeghvpu:20_1: etat purastād valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya
GK19kmeghvpu:21_0: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvilāsānabhijñaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:22_0: sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ kiṃ cit paścād pravalaya gatiṃ bhūya evottareṇa tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:22_1: sādhu mūrdhnā vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:23: na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ // KMdV_17 //
GK19kmeghvpu:24: channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe
GK19kmeghvpu:25_0: nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje
GK19kmeghvpu:26: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya // KMdV_19 //
GK19kmeghvpu:27: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir jambūṣaṇḍapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:28_0: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:29: dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam // KMdV_21 //
GK19kmeghvpu:30: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te /
GK19kmeghvpu:31_0: śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sanayanajalaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:32_0: tvayy āsanne phalapariṇatiśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ saṃpatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:32_1: rājadhānīṃ gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā
GK19kmeghvpu:33_0: tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases
GK19kmeghvpu:33_1: tatra viśrāmahetos tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:34_0: yaḥ paṇyastrīratiparimalodgāribhir nāgarāṇām uddāmāni prathayati śilāveśmabhir yauvanāni // viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni
GK19kmeghvpu:36: vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:37: vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si // KMdV_27 //
GK19kmeghvpu:39: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu // KMdV_28 //
GK19kmeghvpu:40: veṇībhūtapratanusalilāṃ tām atītasya sindhuṃ pāṇḍucchāyāṃ taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:41_0: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantīṃ kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ prāpyāvantīn udayanakathākovidagrāmavṛddhān
GK19kmeghvpu:42: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam // KMdV_30 //
GK19kmeghvpu:43: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:44_0: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ jālodgīrṇair upacitavapuḥ keśasaṃskāradhūmair
GK19kmeghvpu:45_0: harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhvakhinnāntarātmā nītvā rātriṃ lalitavanitāpādarāgāṅkiteṣu bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:45_1: sādaraṃ dṛśyamāṇaḥ puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya
GK19kmeghvpu:46_0: dhūtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhir gandhavatyās toyakrīḍāniratayuvatisnānatiktair marudbhiḥ apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam
GK19kmeghvpu:46_1: āsādya kāle sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad abhyeti bhānuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:47_0: kurvan saṃdhyābalipaṭahatāṃ śūlinaḥ ślāghanīyām āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām pādanyāsakvaṇitaraśanās tatra
GK19kmeghvpu:48: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn āmokṣyanti tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān // KMdV_35 //
GK19kmeghvpu:49: paścād uccairbhujataruvanaṃ maṇḍalenābhilīnaḥ sāṃdhyaṃ tejaḥ pratinavajapāpuṣparaktaṃ dadhānaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:50_0: nṛttārambhe hara paśupater ārdranāgājinecchāṃ śāntodvegastimitanayanaṃ dṛṣṭabhaktir bhavānyā gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:50_1: tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyais tamobhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:51: saudāminyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ // KMdV_37 //
GK19kmeghvpu:52: tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ nītvā rātriṃ ciravilasanāt khinnavidyutkalatraḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:53_0: dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:53_1: yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu
GK19kmeghvpu:54_0: prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś
GK19kmeghvpu:54_1: cetasīva prasanne chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam
GK19kmeghvpu:55_0: tasmāt tasyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān moghīkartuṃ caṭulaśapharodvartanaprekṣitāni tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam
GK19kmeghvpu:55_1: iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ hṛtvā nīlaṃ salilavasanaṃ muktarodhonitambam
GK19kmeghvpu:56_0: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi jñātāsvādaḥ pulinajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ tvanniṣyandocchvasitavasudhāgandhasaṃparkapuṇyaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:57_0: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te śīto vāyuḥ pariṇamayitā kānanodumbarāṇām // tatra skandaṃ niyatavasatiṃ puṣpameghīkṛtātmā
GK19kmeghvpu:58_0: rakṣāhetor navaśaśibhṛtā vāsavīnāṃ camūnām atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya
GK19kmeghvpu:58_1: barhaṃ bhavānī putraprītyā kuvalayapadaprāpi karṇe karoti
GK19kmeghvpu:59_0: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ paścād adrigrahaṇagurubhir garjitair nartayethāḥ ārādhyaivaṃ śaravaṇabhuvaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:59_1: devam ullaṅghitādhvā siddhadvandvair jalakaṇabhayād vīṇibhir muktamārgaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:60_0: vyālambethāḥ surabhitanayālambhajāṃ mānayiṣyan srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate
GK19kmeghvpu:60_1: śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham /
GK19kmeghvpu:61_0: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam tām uttīrya vraja paricitabhrūlatāvibhramāṇāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:63: brahmāvartaṃ janapadam adhaśchāyayā gāhamānaḥ kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:64_0: rājanyānāṃ śitaśaraśatair yatra gāṇḍīvadhanvā dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni hitvā hālām abhimatarasāṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:64_1: revatīlocanāṅkāṃ bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve /
GK19kmeghvpu:65: kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ somya sārasvatīnām antaḥsvacchas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ // KMdV_49 //
GK19kmeghvpu:66: tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim
GK19kmeghvpu:67_0: gaurīvaktrabhrukuṭiracanāṃ yā vihasyeva phenaiḥ śambhoḥ keśagrahaṇam akarod indulagnormihastā tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni
GK19kmeghvpu:67_1: pūrvārdhalambī tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:68_0: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syād asthānopanatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair
GK19kmeghvpu:68_1: mṛgāṇāṃ tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:69_0: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ śobhāṃ ramyāṃ trinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā
GK19kmeghvpu:70_0: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy uttamānām ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:70_1: kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam /
GK19kmeghvpu:71_0: tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam
GK19kmeghvpu:71_1: ardhendumauleḥ śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:72: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ kalpante 'sya
GK19kmeghvpu:74: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ saṃraktābhis tripuravijayo gīyate kiṃnarībhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:75_0: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya
GK19kmeghvpu:75_1: tāṃs tān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram
GK19kmeghvpu:76_0: tenodīcīṃ diśam abhisares tiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva viṣṇoḥ // gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:77_0: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ rāśībhūtaḥ pratiniśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ utpaśyāmi tvayi taṭagate
GK19kmeghvpu:78_0: līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva // hitvā nīlaṃ bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā
GK19kmeghvpu:78_1: dattahastā krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī
GK19kmeghvpu:79_0: bhaṅgībhaktyā viracitavapuḥ stambhitāntarjalo 'syāḥ sopānatvaṃ kuru sukhapadasparśam ārohaṇeṣu tatrāvaśyaṃ janitasalilodgāram
GK19kmeghvpu:80: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ // KMdV_61 //
GK19kmeghvpu:81: hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:82: dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśeḥ paravataṃ tam // KMdV_62 //
GK19kmeghvpu:83: tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādugūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin
GK19kmeghvpu:84_0: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ
GK19kmeghvpu:85: antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ // KMdV_64 //
GK19kmeghvpu:86: haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ nītā rodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ /
